name: drusa
description:
drusa is a tridimensional painting. 

15x15x7

its kind of an homage of me to nature, to paint an object like i could naturally create something from nothing. a crystal, maybe. 

those days i was experimenting with acrylics and abstracts and it was so intense that it invaded my subconscious and i yet dreamed with it. 

the wood frame was part of inoperative house of bees i'd had in my studio.  
~~~~~~~~

its
1/1

i'd like a lot to see it to travel around the world. but remember, i'm in Brazil it maybe will take a little to get your home. but it will be a pleasure to combine the ship with you in dm.
